attributes.action: say no to the request by the US to build part of the missile defence system on UK soil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recent talks have been ongoing between the UK and US for the construction on British soil for part of the missile defence system aka star wars.  The purpose of the shield is to protect America not the UK and may 1. make Britain a higher quality target or 2. the likelihood of large nation ibms warfare is low (the cold war is over folks).
